propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpPrivProtocol
propertyList.description: Authentication protocol used to authorize the identity of user. Not applicable for AXE based nodes.Applicable if SNMP V3 is used and the security level is either AUTH_NO_PRIV or AUTH_PRIV

propertyList.name: ossTopology.fmAlarmSupervision
propertyList.description: FmAlarmSupervision is used to enable or disable alarms in case of any failures. Default value is true.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpAuthProtocol
propertyList.description: Authentication protocol used to authorize the identity of user. Not applicable for AXE based nodes.Applicable if SNMP V3 is used and the security level is either AUTH_NO_PRIV or AUTH_PRIV

propertyList.name: ossTopology.pmFunction
propertyList.description: PmFunction is used to switch on and off PMIC Mediation flows for each Network Element. If PmFunction is on, all file collection, subscription activation, subscription deactivation, scanner polling and scanner master functionality is available for the Network Element. Default value is false.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.axeNodeInterfaceBIp
propertyList.description: Mandatory for AXE-based nodes. IP address for the active side B of the Network Element.

propertyList.name: tags.pm
propertyList.description: pm tag

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpVersion
propertyList.description: SNMP Version. Not applicable for AXE based nodes. In ENM for SNMP V3, it is mandatory to provide as "SNMP_V3".

propertyList.name: ossTopology.sshPortNo
propertyList.description: SSH Port Number. If not provided, default should be used.

propertyList.name: config.nbi.file.json.configMap
propertyList.description: File parameter to add data for json to configmap

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpPrivacyPassword
propertyList.description: Applicable only for ENM when SNMP V3 is used and the security level is AUTH_NO_PRIV or AUTH_PRIV. Password set for authentication with the provided Authentication Protocol for secure authorization.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.axeNodeClusterIP
propertyList.description: Mandatory for AXE-based nodes. The Cluster IP Address of the Network Element.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.isManagerIpAddress
propertyList.description: Mandatory for IS-based AXE nodes. IP address for the SIS interface manager.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.timeZone
propertyList.description: Applicable only for AXE based nodes in ENM. If timeZone is not provided, then the timeZone of the system will be set.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.netConfPort
propertyList.description: NetConf port number.Not applicable for AXE based nodes.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.cmNodeHeartbeatSupervision
propertyList.description: Used only in case of ENM. Enabling CM Supervision will copy the current status of the configuration data of the node into ENM and enable CM Notifications. Enabling CM Notifications ensures that the node will notify ENM of any configuration data changes. Default value is true.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.managedElementId
propertyList.description: The name the VNF will have in ENM

propertyList.name: pm-testapp.ingress.domain
propertyList.description: pm ingress

propertyList.name: ossTopology.axeNodeInterfaceAIp
propertyList.description: Mandatory for AXE-based nodes. IP address for the active side A of the Network Element.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.networkElementVersion
propertyList.description: The Version of the Network Element. Becomes mandatory depending on the "networkElementType".

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpAuthPassword
propertyList.description: Applicable only for ENM when SNMP V3 is used and the security level is AUTH_NO_PRIV or AUTH_PRIV. Password set for authentication with the provided Authentication Protocol for secure authorization.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.communityString
propertyList.description: Community string for SNMP. If not provided,default string "enm-public" would be taken. Not applicable for AXE based nodes.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.sftpPort
propertyList.description: SFTP port.  If port is not provided, then the default port 22 will be set.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.networkElementPassword
propertyList.description: Password to access the the VNF.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.ftpPortNo
propertyList.description: FTP Port Number. If not provided, default should be used.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.nodeIpAddress
propertyList.description: The O&M IP Address of the Network Element. Not applicable for AXE compact nodes.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.transportProtocol
propertyList.description: If transportProtocol is not provided, then the default value SSH will be set

propertyList.name: config.nbi.file.script.configMap
propertyList.description: File parameter to add data for script to configmap

propertyList.name: influxdb.ext.apiAccessHostname
propertyList.description: tags

propertyList.name: ossTopology.networkElementType
propertyList.description: The Network element type.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.disableLdapUser
propertyList.description: Whether to enable or disable node remote authentication with ENM COM-AA. If the parameter is not provided, the default is enable.

propertyList.name: config.nbi.file.enabled
propertyList.description: Enabled creation of file configmap

propertyList.name: eric-adp-gs-testapp.ingress.enabled
propertyList.description: tags

propertyList.name: config.nbi.file.xml.configMap
propertyList.description: File parameter to add data for xml to configmap

propertyList.name: ossTopology.subNetworks
propertyList.description: SubNetwork is used for logical grouping of nodes within ENM.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpPort
propertyList.description: SNMP port. Not applicable for AXE based nodes. If port is not provided, then the default port 161 will be set.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpSecurityLevel
propertyList.description: applicable in case of SNMP V3

propertyList.name: ossTopology.networkElementUsername
propertyList.description: Username to access the the VNF.

propertyList.name: ossTopology.snmpSecurityName
propertyList.description: applicable in case of SNMP V3

propertyList.name: ossTopology.ossServerHostname
propertyList.description: hostname for scripting cluster VM in ENM.

propertyList.description: tags
